name: Rocket Game (Achilleas90)
description:
Use W, Space or Up to boost your rocket.

Use A or left to steer left and D or right to steer right.

Avoid everything except blue platforms and get to the green platform.

There are 7 levels easy levels and 7 hard variations.

Have fun!

v0.2 Changelog:

-Transfered to new Input System

-Added Touch Support

-Removed explosion ring

-Now works on all screens

v.0.3 Changelog:

-New Buttons!

-Main Menu

-Easy and Hard Levels

-More Accurate Rocket Collisions.
